resources.string: Debugging:\n Useful for\n - Backing up all data in Project application folder for transfer.

Debugging:
 Useful for
 - Exporting and Backing-up current database in application
 * To change database 
 - Save current database by exporting out for reimporting if incorrect changes were made

Debugging:
 Useful for
 - Importing and replacing current database in application
 * with new database for use in application
 - Project/Idea examples:
 1. Database Manager
 - Import Function to import new database
 - Read Database
 - Display table and rows
